questions: Write a code using Scapy to extract source IP and destination IP from all packets in a pcap file named 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to count the number of TCP packets in 'smallFlows.pcap' and save the result as JSON.
Create a code using Scapy to extract HTTP headers from HTTP packets in 'smallFlows.pcap' and save them as JSON.
Write a code using Scapy to identify packets with SYN flag set in 'smallFlows.pcap' and log their IPs.
Generate a code using Scapy to calculate the total number of bytes in UDP packets from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to extract DNS queries and their IPs from 'smallFlows.pcap' and save as CSV.
Write a code using Scapy to detect packets with a payload containing 'error' in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to count packets per protocol (TCP, UDP, ICMP) in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to extract TCP packets on port 80 from 'smallFlows.pcap' and save their payloads.
Write a code using Scapy to remove duplicate packets by IP pair in 'smallFlows.pcap' and save unique packets.
Generate a code using Scapy to count TCP retransmissions in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Write a code using Scapy to calculate the average packet size of UDP packets in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to identify packets with TTL less than 10 in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to extract ARP requests and responses from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Write a code using Scapy to detect packets with invalid checksums in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to extract TCP packets with window size zero in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to list ICMP packet types in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Write a code using Scapy to extract packets destined to 192.168.1.1 from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to calculate TCP traffic throughput (bytes/sec) in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to extract VLAN-tagged packets and their VLAN IDs from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Write a code using Scapy to count packets with payload size over 1000 bytes in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to extract TCP packets with ACK flag set in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to identify packets with source port 53 in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Write a code using Scapy to extract packet timestamps and IPs from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to count packets with FIN flag set in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to extract packets with IPv6 headers from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Write a code using Scapy to calculate the ratio of TCP to UDP packets in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Create a code using Scapy to extract packets with a specific MAC address from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Generate a code using Scapy to detect packets with fragmented IP in 'smallFlows.pcap'.
Write a code using Scapy to extract TCP packets with payload over 500 bytes from 'smallFlows.pcap'.
